@metroid wow it’s amazing to see you actually reply properly for once ,impressive

@ maxt Technically yes they are different but most people mistakenly think of two as the same. Cuckold implies that the person who got cheated on is in a sexual relationship with someone whereas netorare means having a loved one stolen from you which could be your mother that you dont have any sexual relations with or your platonic love interest it doest have to involve a sexual relationship unlike cuckold . As fetish cuckold is closer to netorase where the cheated person gets a sexual pleasure from getting cheated.
Cuckold fetish and ntr is different?

anallover64L Beggars cant be choosers bitch. Either learn japanese or shut the fuck up and hope that someone translates it.
